title: "Competitive BSing VS Hate Speech"

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
Now i think most of us know that the OCE  forums has become a  place where people complain and dispute their bans and punishments, But i found this pretty interesting.  "Competitive BSing is fine" says Riot themselves in this tool tip.  Now. I've seen a lot of people on the forums that have been banned or punished that definitely did not fall under hate speech. The definition of hate speech being. "Hate speech is speech which attacks a person or group on the basis of attributes such as race, religion, ethnic origin, sexual orientation, disability, or gender." 

Does someone want to define " Competitive BSing"?  I have seen people on the forums who have been banned for "not using chat constructively." ( Riots words not mine) Forgive me if i'm wrong but Competitive BSing does not sound very constructive to me? but here riot is saying that its fine? So am i allowed to say "Haha you're pretty fucking shit at this game dude"? after someone fails a play? people have been punished for chat like that but it  seems like Competitive BSIng to me? Doesn't fall under hate speech in the slightest so what's the deal here?
